posts.title: AI Automation in Southeast Asia: 2026 Trends and Opportunities
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: Southeast Asia is experiencing an AI revolution. From Singapore to Indonesia, businesses are adopting automation at unprecedented rates. Here's what's driving the change and where the opportunities lie.

posts.title: How to Choose an AI Vendor: A Practical Guide for Business Leaders
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: The AI vendor landscape is crowded and confusing. Here's how to cut through the noise and find a partner who will actually deliver results for your business.

posts.title: The ROI of AI Automation: Real Numbers from Real Projects
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: AI ROI can be transformative — but only with the right projects. Here's what realistic returns look like, based on actual implementations we've done.

posts.title: Why Generic AI Tools Fail Complex Businesses
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: ChatGPT and off-the-shelf AI tools promise the world. But when you're dealing with complex products, internal data, and high-stakes decisions, they fall short. Here's why — and what actually works.

posts.title: From Hours to Minutes: Automating Quote Generation with AI
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: How we helped a professional services firm cut their quoting time from 3 hours to 5 minutes — without sacrificing accuracy or losing the human touch.

posts.title: Is Your Business Ready for AI? A Practical Checklist
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: Not every business is ready for AI. Here's how to assess whether you're in a position to actually benefit from custom AI systems — and what to fix first if you're not.

posts.title: 5 Signs Your Business Needs AI Automation (Not Just Better Software)
posts.author: Alexander Lee
posts.excerpt: Traditional software automates simple tasks. AI automates complex ones. Here's how to know which you actually need.
